scripts.test: npm install && cd ./MetaDataTransformer/ && npm run build && npm run start -- -v build --pattern="/test/**/*.ts" --root-dir="." --out-dir="./test_out" --source-map --inline-source-map && cd ./../MetaDataTransformerUsage/ && npm run restore && cd ./../MetaDataTransformer/ && npm run start -- -v build --pattern="/test/**/*.ts" --root-dir="./../MetaDataTransformerUsage" --out-dir="./test_out" --source-map --inline-source-map && cd ./../ && jest .test.js --coverage --coverageReporters=text-lcov | coveralls
